content: I was born on a Sunday in January, and my mother was born and died in January. My granddaughter, a brother, two uncles, a great doctor from Sergipe, and friends and colleagues were also born in January. On January 17th, I started working at Banco do Brasil. Therefore, this month is special for me.
translations: ita:Io sono nata di domenica di gennaio, e mia madre è nata e morta a gennaio. Anche mia nipote, mio ​​fratello, due zii, un
